author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: Spain reports lowest daily death toll in nearly a month
description:
Spain reported its lowest daily death total for confirmed coronavirus victims in nearly a month as the country fights to contain a savage outbreak that has killed more than 20,000 people. 
Health officials said on Sunday another 410 people have died in the la…
